data.text: Alatala mɔn yi a fala Yuba xa, a naxa,
“I tan naxan Ala Sɛnbɛ Kanna yalagima,
Yuba yi Alatala yabi, a naxa,
“Sese mi n tan na.
N bata falan ti,
Alatala yi Yuba yabi wuluwulu gbeeni, a naxa,
“Keli, i yitɔn alo xɛmɛ wɛkilɛxina,
I waxi a fala feen nin ba
I sɛnbɛn gbo alo Ala ba?
“I yɛtɛ maxidi binyen nun gboon na,
I ya xɔlɔn nasiga muxune ma,
I wasodene birin nagodo sanɲa yi kedenni yati,
i yi ne birin maluxun,
Nayi, xa i yi na liga nun,
“Malinna mato, sube magaxuxina.
A sɛnbɛna a tagin nin.
A xunla xɔdɔxɔ alo sumanna,
A xɔnne fan luxi alo sulana,
“A findixi Alaa dalise fisamantenna nan na.
A balon sɔtɔma geyane fari,
A sama wudine nan bun,
a matabuma wudine nininna nan na,
Xa igen gbo ayi, a mi gaxuma,
Xa a yɛɛne rabixi,
I ige yi sube ɲaxin suxɛ kɔnna ra ba?
I gbalan sɔtɛ a ɲɔɛɛn kui ba,
I mirixi a ma
A layirin xidɛ ɛ tagi ba,
I sabaan soɛ a ra ba alo xɔlina?
Yɛxɛ suxune a matiyɛ lɔxɔni ba,
I nɔɛ a kidin kalɛ xalimakunle ra ba?
Nayi, hali i yiin din a ra a yɛngɛ xinla ma
